item.title: About
item.description: I am a final year engineering student at Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani (BITS-Pilani) located in the beautiful state of Goa in India. I will graduate in May 2019 with a B.E. (Hons.) in Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering. I am currently in my final semester and after graduating I hope to pursue a M.S. in Computer Engineering. In my penultimate semester, I completed my undergraduate thesis at the University of New South Wales, Sydney, under the supervision of Prof.
